inclusion.criterion: histologically confirmed cancer or benign tumours of the head and neck area requiring RT
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: ≥ 50Gy to one side of the neck (conventional or intensity modulated RT)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Prior or subsequent neck dissection allowed (irradiated and/or unirradiated side)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Be able to provide written informed consent
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with bulky nodal neck disease that may interfere with acquisition of ultrasound images
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with a prior history of carotid endarterectomy or carotid angioplasty and stenting
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has severe stenosis in the left internal carotid artery (LICA), as well as moderate stenosis in the right internal carotid artery (RICA).
